section.title: Enabling Capacity and Utilization Data Collection for a Datastore
section.para: Enable Capacity & Utilization data collection for a Datastore.

procedure.title: To Enable Capacity and Utilization Data Collection for a Datastore

step.para: From the right pane, select C & U Collection.

listitem.para: To enable capacity and utilization data collection for all the Datastores in a cloud provider, select Collect for All Datastores.
To enable capacity and utilization data collection by a Datastore, select the desired Datastore from the list under Enable Collection by Datastore.
